import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Destroy an Account Output

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [Wallet](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountId`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountId.html) from the
[`Balance`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html) by calling
the [`Balance.accounts()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html#method.accounts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.rs#L30
```

</div>

3. Destroy it by calling the [`Wallet.burn()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.burn)
    function and passing the `AccountId` as a param.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.rs#L41
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.rs#L44-L46
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput/) from the
[`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/) by accessing
the [`Balance.accounts](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/#accounts) property.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.ts#L39
```

</div>

3. Prepare the transaction that will destroy it by calling the [`Wallet.prepareDestroyAccount()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#preparedestroyaccount)
    function, and send the prepared transaction by calling to [`PreparedTransaction.send()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/PreparedTransaction/#send).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L44-L47
```

</div>

4. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
    [`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.ts#L60
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/output/#accountoutput-objects) from the
[`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/) by accessing
the `Balance.accounts` attribute.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.py#L20
```

</div>

3. Prepare the transaction that will destroy it by calling the [`Wallet.prepare_destroy_account()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#prepare_destroy_account)
    function, and send the prepared transaction by calling to [`PreparedTransaction.send()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/prepared_transaction/#send).


<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/destroy.py#L25
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
